plant.question: I have a big head, but no brain. I stand in the garden, and scare birds away. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🌾 Farmers use me
👒 I wear clothes, but I'm not alive
🌽 I help keep the corn safe

plant.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny likes me
🧡 I am the color of a sunset
🌱 I grow under the ground

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on trees. Sometimes I fall on people's heads. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me
🥧 You can make a pie with me
🌳 I grow on a tree

plant.question: I am tall and green, and I have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make houses from me
🐿️ Squirrels climb me
🍃 I give shade on a sunny day

plant.question: I'm green and grow on the ground. You can walk on me with your bare feet. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play sports on me
🐄 Cows eat me
🌱 I am a ground cover.

plant.question: I'm a seed that pops when it gets hot. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🎬 You eat me while watching films
🌽 I start as a type of corn
🔥 I need heat to become yummy.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet, and bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees make honey from me
💐 People give me as a gift
🌸 I come in many colors

plant.question: I grow in bunches, and I'm purple or green. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love me!
🍌 I grow on a tree but am not an apple
💜 I can be yellow, green or even purple

plant.question: I have a thick rind, but I'm sweet inside. You have to cut me open to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have a tough outer layer
🍉 I'm big and round and juicy
☀️ I grow best in the summertime

plant.question: I am a hard nut that grows on a tall palm. I have water inside that you can drink. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a special tree in warm places
🥥 You can drink the liquid inside me
🐒 Monkeys like to drop me

animal.question: I say 'Meow', love to chase string, and drink milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I love to drink this from a bowl
🧶 I like to play with yarn
🐈‍⬛ I have whiskers and a tail

animal.question: I quack, waddle, and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🪞 I like water
🥚 I come from an egg
🧡 My beak is orange

animal.question: I bark, wag my tail, and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🍖 I love to chew on bones
🎾 I like to chase balls
🫂 I am a man's best friend

animal.question: I am big and gray, have a long trunk, and love peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts
🐘 I am very big
👂 I have big ears

animal.question: I roar, live in the jungle, and am known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am known as the king
🦁 I have a mane
🐾 I am a big cat

animal.question: I hop, have long ears, and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat this vegetable
🐰 I have a fluffy tail
🌱 I can jump really high

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, and eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am related to a horse
🎨 I have a unique pattern
🌱 I love to graze in the fields

animal.question: I swing from trees, eat bananas, and chatter with my friends. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I love this yellow fruit
🐒 I like to play in trees
🗣️ I like to make sounds with other of my kind

animal.question: I hiss, slither on the ground, and sometimes have venom. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I have scales
🌿 I like to live in warm places
👅 I stick out my tongue to smell

animal.question: I have a long neck, eat leaves from tall trees, and have a spotted coat. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal
🌳 I can reach high places
🤎 I have brown spots
